replies.body:
{{champion:27}}  Probably one of the best. If you're good at him. Poison between the enemy and your minions (running sideways usually helps) while being careful not to hard shove the lane in their direction. Them farming = being forced to take poison damage.

{{champion:268}} Soldier spam {{champion:53}} Constant pull threat {{champion:58}} You're rarely going to outtrade {{champion:8}} Come close and you'll heal him {{champion:122}} Soloqueue stomper, most opponents can't go near without being "decimated". Same with {{champion:24}} .  {{champion:34}} Ult/wall combo.

{{champion:120}}support standing on your minions Kappa

Anything works, really. These are just some off the top of my head. It all depends on getting yourself a lead. Just make sure if you're going to go the cs denial route to ward appropriately as most of the time you'll be susceptible to ganks.
I'd completely agree with {{champion:268}}. He doesn't really have a hard counter during lane phase, besides being jungle camped.

> [{quoted}](name=kJs,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=nWqwEtPZ,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-05-19T11:19:52.606+0000)
>
> He doesn't really have a hard counter during lane phase

> {{champion:268}} Soldier spam {{champion:53}} Constant pull threat {{champion:58}} You're rarely going to outtrade {{champion:8}} Come close and you'll heal him {{champion:122}} Soloqueue stomper, most opponents can't go near without being "decimated". Same with {{champion:24}} .  {{champion:34}} Ult/wall combo.
> 
> {{champion:120}}support standing on your minions Kappa
> 
> Anything works, really. These are just some off the top of my head. It all depends on getting yourself a lead. Just make sure if you're going to go the cs denial route to ward appropriately as most of the time you'll be susceptible to ganks.

Couldn't agree more on this list
